name: Arcana (itch) (Funky Mushrooms)
description:
Description:

Arcana is a retro-style action platformer where players have to face a randomized set of challenges represented by a tarot reading at the beginning of each level. Depending on the cards that are dealt, players will have to defeat or avoid an onslaught of enemies until the timer runs out. A new fate awaits with every playthrough!

We greatly appreciate your ratings and comments :) 

How to Play:

Read your fortune to see what you need to defeat or avoid, and what you are immune to.

  • Enemies you need to defeat will attack you too.
  • Enemies you need to avoid will only hurt you if you attack them.
  • Enemies you are immune to will only appear to attack you, but will not cause damage.

Move: WASD

Jump: Spacebar

Attack: Mouse button or L
